heading: HR00849
0: RESOLUTION CONDEMNING THE KILLING OF DR. DREYFUSS PERLAS AKA "BARRIO DOK", URGING THE PHILIPPINE NATIONAL POLICE TO CONDUCT A FACT-FINDING INVESTIGATION INTO AND URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF THE INTERIOR AND LOCAL GOVERNMENT AND DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH TO IMPLEMENT  NECESSARY MEASURES TO ENSURE THE SAFETY OF VOLUNTEER DOCTORS

House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00849
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION CONDEMNING THE KILLING OF DR. DREYFUSS PERLAS AKA "BARRIO DOK", URGING THE PHILIPPINE NATIONAL POLICE TO CONDUCT A FACT-FINDING INVESTIGATION INTO AND URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF THE INTERIOR AND LOCAL GOVERNMENT AND DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH TO IMPLEMENT NECESSARY MEASURES TO ENSURE THE SAFETY OF VOLUNTEER DOCTORS
